# The `SchedCandidate` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Store the state used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericscheduler">GenericScheduler</a> heuristics, required for the lifetime of one invocation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy/#ab8f81fac35fcedf80a58ef268409d328">pickNode()</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Store the state used by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericscheduler">GenericScheduler</a> heuristics, required for the lifetime of one invocation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy/#ab8f81fac35fcedf80a58ef268409d328">pickNode()</a>.

Definition at line 1128 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.
